src.view.gameui package¶

Submodules¶

src.view.gameui.gameui module¶

A utility to create a text box at the bottom of the screen.

This class can be used to create a text box with custom text in the Pygame UI.

Usage:

myTextBox = UITextBox(screen, 20, “monospace”, 14) myTextBox.draw(“Pyramids look funny.”) myTextBox.erase()

class src.view.gameui.gameui.UITextBox(screen, margin, font, fontsize)¶

Bases: object

A UI text box to write a piece of dialogue or information at the bottom of the screen.

A UI text box that scales quite well.

screen¶

The pygame screen.

margin¶

The space between the window and the box at either side of it.

font¶

The font used in the text box.

fontsize¶

The size of the text.

draw(text: str)¶

Draws the box to the screen.

Parameters:

text – The text to write in the box.

erase()¶

Removes the current text.

src.view.gameui.healthbar module¶

A UI health indicator to inform the player of their remaining health.

This class can be used to add a health bar to the Pygame UI, with methods to increase and decrease health.

Usage:

myHealthBar = HealthBar(100) myHealthBar.reduceHealth(20) myHealthBar.drawMaxHealth(screen) myHealthBar.drawCurrentHealth(screen)

class src.view.gameui.healthbar.HealthBar(maxHealth: int)¶

Bases: object

A UI health indicator to inform the player of their remaining health.

A health indicator with methods to track the current health.

maxHealth¶

The maximum health of the player.

currentHealth¶

The player’s current health.

drawCurrentHealth(screen, currentHealth)¶

Draws the current health, in green, to the screen.

This is the variable part of the healthbar.

Parameters:

  • screen – The pygame screen.

  • currentHealth – The current health amount. This must be less than maxHealth.

drawMaxHealth(screen)¶

Draws the maximum health bar, in white, to the screen.

This is the background section of the healthbar.

Parameters:

screen – The pygame screen.

reduceHealth(damage: int)¶

Reduces the player’s current health.

Parameters:

damage – The amount of health to reduce the current health by.
